arts.ttl: Netherlands vs Poland – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Netherlands continue their 2026 World Cup qualification campaign with a crucial Group G encounter against Poland at De Kuip in Rotterdam on Thursday. The Oranje host the Poles on home soil with both teams level on six points, though the Dutch have played one game less.
